channel.title: - Project Pearl Version 4.1 End is near / MOD CLOSE THIS
channel.description:
[font=Verdana][size=30pt][i][b]MOD CLOSE THIS![/b][/i][/size][/font]
[size=20pt][b]Project Pearl v4.1[/b][/size]
[b]Project Pearl is back and bether than ever, when i finish this project i'm going to stop coding delta's shitty sources and start using iClarity.[/b]
http://v4.tinypic.com/player.swf?file=23mkal2&s=4
Cleaning Client.java: Client.java Size: [b]614kb[/b] Handlers: [i]*[b]111,11 Kb[/b] cleaned till now*[/i] [code] ItemsondeathHandler(74kb) CommandsHandler(11,5kb) DegradeHandler(5,77kb) LevelupHandler(9,44kb) BarrowsHandler(10,4kb) [/code]
[b]Prayer interface:[/b] [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2rq1x0j.jpg[/img]
[i][b][size=10pt]Godsword Special Attack's.[/size][/b][/i] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1FpDtWcTCvA]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1FpDtWcTCvA[/url]
[b]All God wars bosses.[/b] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/rlcok5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/ms0pxe.jpg[/img] [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/11ukmk3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/1o546v.jpg[/img]
[b]Checkout new Skillscape Systems:[/b] Crafting: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O2LkjyPK8-A Prayer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aCly8GzRH7o Slayer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZWbLylUSTs4
[b]-New things[b] [code] New Skillscape System. New Herblore system. Improved Barrows. All Godsword Shards. Saradomin Brews now working. Deposit Equipment working! Deposit Invetory working! Bank sorting working! You can only login with 1 account at the same time. [/code]
[b]-Minigames[/b] Barrows: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0V4UZ5SHYFQ Pestcontrol: Still working on..
[b]-Combat Skills[/b]
Magic 80%: I did fix the God spells and added Teleother that work 100% without bugs. Iban blast works now. Magic dart also works. [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/dzv029.jpg[/img] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/rk7oqr.jpg[/img]
Ranged 70%: Fixed the Magic short bow special. I don't have the exact ranged maxhit formula, but range following is added 100%
Melee 80%: Most of this was done by Delta_, i have fixed the dds special hit 20/0 15/0 it will hit better like 20/20 15/12 etc.
[b]-483 Gameframe[/b] 80% Like I said in the title proof: Just needs new[b] Prayer [/b]Interfaces! [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2n84t2g.jpg[/img]
[b]-I've added Perfect Weapon timers[/b] I have used all weapons on current Runescape and wrote the times.
[b]-Emote's[/b] Emote's i got atm: [code] All Godsword Emote's Veng/Veng other emote Rune Crossbow emote Whip emote's [/code]
[b]-Items wealth displayed on items on death interface:[/b] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/if2agi.jpg[/img]
[b]-World Map[/b] 100% Only for npc's, credits goes to guy on r-serva.
[b]-100% Fixed Xlogg[/b] 100% You will not logout if you close your client during combat. Video:[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_vkVzgurOA] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E_vkVzgurOA[/url]
[b]-TzHaar Fight Pit[/b] Players fight in a pit in a safe, Free-for-all area. The winner of each game will get 2,500,000 coins.
[b]-Dagganoths Dungeons[/b] 30% -Dagganoths Door 100% You will need a person standing on doorA & door B, to open the door. -Spinolyp's 99% The Spinolyps work 99% only thing is I can't find the attack emote. When you enter the area the Spinolyps will 100% posion you no mather what, they will attack with magic and range.
[b]-TzHaar Fight Cave(Fire cape)[/b] Players fight alone against TzTok-Jad. If they can defeat TzTok-Jad, they will get a Fire cape. There are 63 Wave's with ThZaar Npc's its hard. -New: You can see how many wave's you have past and how many ThZaar Npc's you have killed.
Pictures:
Finally fixed equipment screen. [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/dy9avn.jpg[/img]
[b]Deleted some pic's because i only got those interfaces not in game when i got them in game i send them again.[/b]
